import React from "react"; import map from "../images/maps/UCLAMAP.png"; import "../css/update.css"; import Axios from 'axios' class Update extends React.Component { changeMap(num) { if (localStorage.getItem("loggedIn") === "false"){ alert("please log in to update the location!") } else{ alert("you have updated the location"); Axios.post("https://bruin-pawprint.herokuapp.com/updateBuilding", { number : num }).then(() =>{ console.log("success"); }).then((response) => { console.log(response); }); console.log("you have updated the location "+num); } } render() { return ( <>
